title: What Have We Learned From the First Half of the NBA Season? | The Answer
description:
Chris is joined by The Athletic’s Wosny Lambre to discuss what lessons they’ve learned from the NBA season thus far (02:30). Some topics include Joel Embiid’s dominance (19:00), Zion Williamson’s rise into superstardom (23:00), and the art of tanking (28:00).
Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Wosny Lambre
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
